attributes.action: Allow Allergy-Sufferers Into the UK Armed Forces
attributes.additional_details:
Currently, anyone suffering with a peanut/nut allergy cannot join the UK armed forces. However the Army, Royal Navy and RAF cater for those requiring Halal, Kosher and Vegetarian meals.

Proposal: To allow sufferers of any peanut/ nut allergy to join any of the UK forces PROVIDING they sign a disclaimer in the event they may suffer an attack.

Many Youngsters are finding that there carers and dreams are not going to happen because of this dis-qualifier.
